name: Automated Abstraction via Information Bottleneck
definition: The optimal Meso-Linker (Abstraction) between scales is the variable that maximizes predictive power while minimizing complexity.
mechanism: Information Bottleneck: Maximize I(Macro; Future) / I(Micro; Macro).
application: Automated Science, Multi-Scale Modeling, Inverse Design.
implications: We do not need to manually define order parameters.
The system can 'discover' physics by looking for predictable macro-variables.
This enables the automated construction of the NRM vNext Hierarchical Stack.
